name: Can You Escape? (Cane77)
description:
My first Ludum Dare so go easy on me lol

You have to try to escape the room but every time you do, you're looped back to the beginning again. Press E to interact with keys, buttons and doors to escape the room.

I'm not really sure I can call this a "finished game" but I'm still happy with it considering it was my first jam. I hope you find some enjoyment in it even if it's just the music.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Mouse to look

E to interact

Made for Ludum Dare 47
